title: "Mega Marble Mania Madness"Transliteration: "Kyōsō no Bīda Mania" (Japanese:狂騒のビーダマニア)
transformers_text: Mega Marble Mania Madness Transliteration Ky s no B da Mania Japanese Kara and Shiki While volunteering at Kara's family shrine Nico's experiments with enchanted paper ultimately leads to Kara creating a shiki gam is he names Shiki On the way home from school Shiki accidentally drops Kara's treasured hair clip gifted by her late mother into a river Feeling guilty Shiki dives into the river and recovers it Afterwards Kara and Shiki reach a compromise Mega Marble Mania Madness As a prank to prove his salesman skills Kan shi manages to convince Kei go to buy a random marble Kei go then makes a video about it which goes viral Seeing how far the prank has gone Kan shi eventually comes clean to his friends Once the marble craze dies down Kei go Nico and Kan shi post an apology video on Kei go's channel Scramble Scrap Squad While searching through his things Mori hito uncovers an old manga that he drawn Nico casts a spell to transport everybody into the manga but ends up turning everybody into drawings instead When the wind blows one of the pages away the group chases after it While recovering the page they help stop a robbery Nico turns everybody back to normal and they head home albeit they forget about Kan shi
